title: assertion failure with src/test/ui/pattern/const-pat-ice.rs

labels.name: A-testsuite
labels.description: Area: The testsuite used to check the correctness of rustc

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
````rust

// failure-status: 101
// rustc-env:RUST_BACKTRACE=0

// This is a repro test for an ICE in our pattern handling of constants.

const FOO: &&&u32 = &&&42;

fn main() {
    match unimplemented!() {
        &&&42 => {},
        FOO => {},
        _ => {},
    }
}
````

When checking with "cargo check", rustc hits an assertion failure:
````
    Checking crash v0.1.0 (/tmp/crash)
warning: unreachable arm
 --> src/main.rs:7:18
  |
7 |         &&&42 => {},
  |                  ^^
  |
  = note: #[warn(unreachable_code)] on by default

warning: unreachable pattern
 --> src/main.rs:8:9
  |
8 |         FOO => {},
  |         ^^^
  |
  = note: #[warn(unreachable_patterns)] on by default

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: rows.iter().all(|r| r.len() == v.len())', src/librustc_mir/hair/pattern/_match.rs:1069:5
````
